original: Jump to a new level of spirituality.

Screw these city planners trying to keep us down, man. Speed limits and white lines in the middle of the road and all that shit are just there to impede our consciousness and stop us from living our lives. I mean, who the fuck can tell me that this is a one way street or I can't turn fucking left here? Expand your horizons, man. Take off from the street and attain true enlightenment. These are some places I found to jump from the bureaucrats' road makings and get some air. Especially good on high power blotter acid or peyote.
translated: 搞城市规划的人真他妈能恶心人。路上又是限速，又是画线啥的，只会搞人脑子，真是不让人活了。我说，谁他妈有资格规定这是单行道？凭啥这里又不能左转了？开点眼界吧，哥们。在街道上起飞，去获得真正的启蒙吧。我找到的这些地方可以从狗官们的路标上飞起来，呼吸新鲜空气。配合正宗的「邮票」或者「仙人掌」效果更好。

original: Nice one, man.  Thx for the info.
translated: 真不错，哥们。感谢你的情报。
